headline: Idex: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of six analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $2.03 per share. The maker of the Jaws of Life device and other engineered products posted revenue of $862.9 million in the period, which did not meet Street forecasts. Four analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $865 million.

headline: IDEX (NYSE:IEX) Reports Sales Below Analyst Estimates In Q4 Earnings
summary: Manufacturing company IDEX (NYSE:IEX) missed Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q4 CY2024, but sales rose 9.4% year on year to $862.9 million. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.04 per share was 0.5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: IDEX Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2024 Results
summary: NORTHBROOK, Ill., February 04, 2025--IDEX Corporation (NYSE: IEX) today announced its financial results for the quarter and year ended December 31, 2024.

headline: IDEX Gears Up to Post Q4 Earnings: What Lies Ahead for the Stock?
summary: Strength in the FMT and FSDP segments and accretive acquisitions are likely to aid IEX's fourth-quarter results.
